description:
Middle school Jun `who wound the key` still lies trapped in the N-Field with Kanaria where time passes slowly, while Shinku prepares for her final night with university Jun `who did not wind the key` as the stage production of Practica Dolls begins. The empty clock strikes and Kirakisho magically appears in the vessel of Jun`s "very own doll" he had been working on.
Source: crunchyroll
